Class ChatController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatController

  • public class ChatController
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for checking if a user has permission to send messages and the methods for sending messages.
    Author:
    Elliot, Chrisee

      ChatController(java.lang.String username, Registrar reg, EventManager em)
      Initializes a new ChatController.

      Checks if sender can send to all participants of all events in a list.

      • canMessage

        public boolean canMessage(java.lang.Long evt)
        Checks if sender can send messages to all Attendees of an event.
        Parameters:
        evt - Event id
        Returns:

      • canSendSpeakers

        public boolean canSendSpeakers(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> speakers)
        Checks if sender can send a message to all Speakers.
        Parameters:
        speakers - List of usernames of speakers that the sender wants to send to
        Returns:
        True if sender has permission to message all speakers

        Returns:

      • sendMessage
